atk-abh03a2:3_1: Idāni pañcakkhandhādivasena nikkhittamātikaṁ ‘saṅgaho asaṅgaho’tiādīhi nayamātikāpadehi saddhiṁ yojetvā dassetuṁ rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehītiādinā nayena niddesavāro āraddho.
atk-abh03a2:3_4: tasmā rūpakkhandhādīnaṁ saṅgahaṁ dassetuṁ katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhīti tīṇi khandhāyatanadhātupadāneva uddhaṭāni.
atk-abh03a2:3_6: Yasmā ca ‘‘sabhāgo visabhāgo’’ti evaṁ lakkhaṇamātikā ṭhapitā,
atk-abh03a2:3_7: tasmā imassa pañhassa vissajjane rūpakkhandho ekena khandhenātiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:3_10: Yañhi kiñci rūpaṁ rūpakkhandhasabhāgattā rūpakkhandhotveva saṅgahaṁ gacchatīti rūpakkhandheneva gaṇitaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:3_13: Sabbopi hi rūpakkhandho dasāyatanāni dhammāyatanekadeso ca hoti,
atk-abh03a2:3_15: Ekādasahi dhātūhīti sattaviññāṇadhātuvajjāhi ekādasahi etāsu hi apariyāpannaṁ rūpaṁ nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a2:4_0: Asaṅgahanayaniddese katihi asaṅgahitoti saṅkhepeneva pucchā katā.
atk-abh03a2:4_1: Vissajjane panassa yasmā rūpakkhandhassa visabhāgā cattāro arūpakkhandhā, ekaṁ manāyatanaṁ, satta viññāṇadhātuyo;
atk-abh03a2:4_4: Imasmiṁ pana khandhaniddese – ‘‘rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehī’’tiādimhi tāva ekamūlake saṅgahanaye sarūpeneva dassitā pañca pucchā, pañca vissajjanāni.
atk-abh03a2:4_5: Asaṅgahanaye saṅkhepena dassitā pañca pucchā, pañca vissajjanāni.
atk-abh03a2:4_8: Pañcake pana ‘‘rūpakkhandho ca…pe… viññāṇakkhandho cā’’ti evaṁ bhedato ca,
atk-abh03a2:4_9: ‘‘pañcakkhandhā katihi khandhehī’’ti evaṁ abhedato cāti dvidhā pucchāvissajjanāni katāni. Evaṁ pāḷinayo veditabboti.
atk-abh03a2:6_1: Āyatanapadaniddesādīsu āyatanapadaniddese tāva cakkhāyatanaṁ ekena khandhenāti ekena rūpakkhandheneva,
atk-abh03a2:6_2: ekena cakkhāyataneneva ekāya cakkhudhātuyāva saṅgahitanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:6_4: Asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvāti ettha pana yasmā asaṅkhataṁ dhammāyatanaṁ nāma nibbānaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:6_9: Viññāṇakkhandhena pana ṭhapetvā dhammāyatanadhammadhātuyo sesāyatanadhātūhi ca taṁ na saṅgayhati.
atk-abh03a2:6_14: Dukamattameva pana pāḷiyaṁ dassetvā ‘‘dvādasāyatanānī’’ti abhedatova pucchāvissajjanaṁ kataṁ. Dhātuniddesepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a2:7_2: Yasmā ca dukatikesu samudayasaccasadisameva maggasaccepi vissajjanaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:8_1: Indriyaniddese – jīvitindriyaṁ dvīhi khandhehīti rūpajīvitindriyaṁ rūpakkhandhena,
atk-abh03a2:10_1: Paṭiccasamuppādaniddese – ‘‘avijjā katihi khandhehī’’ti pucchaṁ anārabhitvā avijjā ekena khandhenāti evaṁ vissajjanameva dassitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:10_2: Tattha saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇanti paṭisandhiyaṁ pavatte ca sabbampi vipākaviññāṇaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:10_5: Tenevettha saddāyatanampi saṅgahetvā ekādasahāyatanehi saṅgaho dassito.
atk-abh03a2:10_7: Aññeneva hi ekena khandhena phasso saṅgahito, aññena vedanā,
atk-abh03a2:10_10: Tattha kammabhavo phassādīhi sadisavisajjanattā tehi saddhiṁ ekato dassito.
atk-abh03a2:10_12: Yasmā cete upādinnakadhammāva tasmā ‘‘ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhī’’ti vuttaṁ. Saddāyatanañhi anupādinnaṁ, taṁ ettha na gahitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:11_5: Tattha dvīhāyatanehīti rūpāyatanadhammāyatanehi. Dhātūsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a2:11_6: Ekatalavāsikānañhi sesabrahmānaṁ cakkhusabbhāvato tassārammaṇattā tattha rūpāyatanaṁ uddhaṭaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:12_0: 71.Jāti dvīhi khandhehīti rūpajāti rūpakkhandhena, arūpajāti saṅkhārakkhandhena. Jarāmaraṇesupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a2:12_1: Sokādīsupi ekena khandhenāti sokadukkhadomanassāni vedanākkhandhena, paridevo rūpakkhandhena,
atk-abh03a2:13_4: Cittaṁ pana cetanānantaraṁ nikkhittampi asadisavissajjanattā pacchā gahitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:13_5: Tattha appamaññādīsu ekena khandhenāti vedanā vedanākkhandhena, saññā saññākkhandhena,
atk-abh03a2:13_6: sesā saṅkhārakkhandhena saṅgahitāti evaṁ khandhaviseso veditabbo.
atk-abh03a2:15_1: Evaṁ abbhantaramātikāya saṅgahaṁ dassetvā idāni bāhiramātikāya saṅgahaṁ dassetuṁ kusalā dhammātiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:15_3: Sattahi dhātūhīti cakkhusotaghānajivhāviññāṇadhātūhi ceva manodhātudhammadhātumanoviññāṇadhātūhi ca.
atk-abh03a2:15_4: Vipākattike aṭṭhahi dhātūhīti kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā saddhiṁ tāhiyeva.
atk-abh03a2:15_5: Vipākadhammadhammā pana saṁkiliṭṭhasaṁkilesikehi saddhiṁ sadisavissajjanattā ekato gahitā. Yathā cete,
atk-abh03a2:15_6: evaṁ sabbatikadukapadesu yaṁ yaṁ padaṁ yena yena padena saddhiṁ sadisavissajjanaṁ hoti,
atk-abh03a2:15_7: taṁ taṁ uppaṭipāṭiyāpi tena tena saddhiṁ gahetvā vissajjitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:18_1: Idāni saṅgahitena asaṅgahitapadaṁ bhājetuṁ cakkhāyatanenātiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:18_2: Tatridaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ – imasmiñhi vāre yaṁ khandhapadena saṅgahitaṁ hutvā āyatanadhātupadehi asaṅgahitaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:18_3: khandhāyatanapadehi vā saṅgahitaṁ hutvā dhātupadena asaṅgahitaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:18_4: tassa khandhādīhi asaṅgahaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:18_7: So ca aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahito nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a2:18_10: Evaṁ asaṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni aññāni ca evarūpāni manāyatanadhammāyatanādīni padāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:18_11: Yāni pana padāni rūpekadesaṁ arūpena asammissaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:18_12: viññāṇekadesañca aññena asammissaṁ dīpenti, tāni idha gahitāni. Pariyosāne ca –
atk-abh03a2:23_2: Pañhavasena hi imasmiṁ vāre āyatanadhātuvaseneva sadisavissajjane vīsati dhamme samodhānetvā eko pañho kato,
atk-abh03a2:23_4: sattindriyāni samodhānetvā eko, dve bhave samodhānetvā eko,
atk-abh03a2:23_5: paridevena ca sanidassanasappaṭighehi ca eko, anidassanasappaṭighehi eko, sanidassanehi eko,
atk-abh03a2:23_6: sappaṭighehi ca upādādhammehi ca ekoti aṭṭha pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a2:23_7: Tesu khandhādivibhāgo evaṁ veditabbo seyyathidaṁ – paṭhamapañhe tāva catūhi khandhehīti arūpakkhandhehi,
atk-abh03a2:23_9: aṭṭhahi dhātūhīti cakkhudhātuādīsu ekekāya saddhiṁ sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a2:24_0: Tatrāyaṁ nayo – cakkhāyatanena hi khandhasaṅgahena rūpakkhandho saṅgahito.
atk-abh03a2:24_1: Tasmiṁ saṅgahite rūpakkhandhe āyatanasaṅgahena cakkhāyatanamevekaṁ saṅgahitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:24_3: Dhātusaṅgahenapi tena cakkhudhātuyevekā saṅgahitā. Sesā dasa dhātuyo asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:24_7: tā cakkhudhātuyā ceva sattahi ca viññāṇadhātūhi asaṅgahitāti. Rūpāyatanādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a2:25_1: Dutiyapañhe – yasmā yāya kāyaci viññāṇadhātuyā saṅgahito viññāṇakkhandho manāyatanena asaṅgahito nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a2:25_3: Ettha pana catūhi khandhehīti rūpādīhi catūhi.
atk-abh03a2:25_5: Dvādasahi dhātūhīti yathānurūpā cha viññāṇadhātuyo apanetvā sesāhi dvādasahi.
atk-abh03a2:25_6: Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā hi cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyeva saṅgahitā, itarā asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:26_2: Itthindriyapurisindriyesu pana dhammāyatanena saddhiṁ dve āyatanāni,
atk-abh03a2:26_3: dhammadhātuyā ca saddhiṁ aṭṭha dhātuyo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:27_2: Tesu hi bhavesu rūpāyatanadhammāyatanavasena dveva āyatanāni tehi saṅgahitāni .
atk-abh03a2:27_3: Sesāni nava rūpāyatanāni teheva ca dvīhi,
atk-abh03a2:27_4: manāyatanena cāti tīhi asaṅgahitāni nāma honti.
atk-abh03a2:27_5: Navahi dhātūhīti rūpadhātudhammadhātūhi saddhiṁ sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a2:28_3: Dhātuyopi tesaṁyeva ekekena saddhiṁ satta viññāṇadhātuyo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:29_3: Anidassanasappaṭighā hi dhammā nāma nava oḷārikāyatanāni.
atk-abh03a2:29_7: Dhātusaṅgahenapi tā eva nava dhātuyo saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:29_9: Iti yāni tehi asaṅgahitāni dve āyatanāni ,
atk-abh03a2:29_14: sattahi ca viññāṇadhātūhīti soḷasahi asaṅgahitāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:30_2: Aṭṭhahi dhātūhīti rūpadhātuyā saddhiṁ sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a2:31_2: upādādhamme sandhāya phoṭṭhabbāyatanavajjehi. Dhātūsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a2:34_2: Tatridaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ – imasmiñhi vāre yaṁ khandhapadena asaṅgahitaṁ hutvā āyatanadhātupadehi saṅgahitaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:34_3: tassa khandhādīhi saṅgahaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:34_5: Rūpakkhandhena hi cattāro khandhā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:34_6: Tesu tena ekadhammopi āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahito nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a2:34_7: Nanu ca vedanādayo dhammāyatanena saṅgahitāti? Saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:34_13: Tesu tena ekopi āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahito nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a2:34_14: Evaṁ saṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni aññāni ca evarūpāni cakkhāyatanādīni padāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:34_15: Yāni pana padāni viññāṇena vā oḷārikarūpena vā asammissaṁ dhammāyatanekadesaṁ dīpenti, tāni idha gahitāni. Tesaṁ idamuddānaṁ –
atk-abh03a2:35_0: ‘‘Tayo khandhā tathā saccā, indriyāni ca soḷasa;
atk-abh03a2:39_0: Etesu pana padesu sadisavissajjanāni padāni ekato katvā sabbepi dvādasa pañhā vuttā.
atk-abh03a2:39_3: Tattha paṭhamapañhe tāva – tīhi khandhehīti rūpasaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhehi.
atk-abh03a2:40_0: Tatrāyaṁ nayo – vedanākkhandhena hi nibbānañca sukhumarūpasaññāsaṅkhārā ca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā hutvā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:40_4: Tena vuttaṁ – ‘‘asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi, ekenāyatanena, ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā’’ti.
atk-abh03a2:40_5: Saññākkhandhapakkhe panettha saññaṁ apanetvā vedanāya saddhiṁ tayo khandhā saṅkhārādīsu saṅkhārakkhandhaṁ apanetvā rūpavedanāsaññāvasena tayo khandhā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:41_2: Te hi nirodhena khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā hutvā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:42_2: Rūpārūpajīvitindriyena hi vedanāsaññāviññāṇakkhandhā ca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:44_2: Jhānena pana nibbānaṁ sukhumarūpaṁ saññā ca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā hutvā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:44_3: Tasmā taṁ sandhāya rūpakkhandhasaññākkhandhānaṁ vasena dve khandhā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:45_1: Chaṭṭhe – sokādittaye vedanāya sadiso. Upāyāsādīsu saṅkhārasadiso.
atk-abh03a2:48_2: Tattha yaṁ khandhādīhi saṅgahitena khandhādivasena saṅgahitaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:48_3: puna tasseva khandhādīhi saṅgahaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:48_4: Taṁ khandhāyatanadhātūsu ekampi sakalakoṭṭhāsaṁ gahetvā ṭhitapadesu na yujjati.
atk-abh03a2:48_5: Sakalena hi khandhādipadena aññaṁ khandhādivasena saṅgahitaṁ nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a2:48_6: yaṁ attano saṅgāhakaṁ saṅgaṇhitvā puna teneva saṅgahaṁ gaccheyya.
atk-abh03a2:48_7: Tasmā tathārūpāni padāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:48_8: Yāni pana padāni saṅkhārekadesaṁ vā aññena asammissaṁ dīpenti – vedanekadesaṁ vā sukhumarūpaṁ vā saddekadesaṁ vā, tāni idha gahitāni. Tesaṁ idamuddānaṁ –
atk-abh03a2:51_3: te dhamme sandhāya sabbattha ekena khandhenātiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:51_4: Tatrāyaṁ nayo – samudayasaccena hi taṇhāvajjā sesā saṅkhārā khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitā. Puna tehi taṇhāva saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:51_5: Sā taṇhā puna saṅkhāreheva khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitāti. Eseva nayo sabbattha.
atk-abh03a2:51_6: Arūpadhammapucchāsu panettha saṅkhārakkhandho vā vedanākkhandho vā eko khandho nāma.
atk-abh03a2:51_8: Paridevapucchāya saddāyatanaṁ ekaṁ āyatanaṁ nāma. Saddadhātu ekā dhātu nāma,
atk-abh03a2:54_1: Idāni asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitapadaṁ bhājetuṁ rūpakkhandhenātiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:54_2: Tattha yaṁ khandhādīhi asaṅgahitena khandhādivasena asaṅgahitaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:54_3: puna tasseva khandhādīhi asaṅgahaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:54_4: Taṁ pañcakkhandhaggāhakesu dukkhasaccādīsu viññāṇena saddhiṁ sukhumarūpaggāhakesu anidassanaappaṭighādīsu ca padesu na yujjati.
atk-abh03a2:54_5: Tādisena hi padena nibbānaṁ khandhasaṅgahamattaṁ na gaccheyya.
atk-abh03a2:54_7: Tasmā tathārūpāni padāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:54_8: Yāni pana pañcakkhandhe viññāṇañca sukhumarūpena saddhiṁ ekato na dīpenti, tāni idha gahitāni. Tesaṁ idamuddānaṁ –
atk-abh03a2:58_0: Gocchake sattati dve ca, satta cūḷantare padā.
atk-abh03a2:60_0: Aṭṭhāraseva ñātabbā, sesā idha na bhāsitā’’ti.
atk-abh03a2:61_0: Pañhā panettha sadisavissajjanānaṁ vasena samodhānetvā katihi saddhiṁ sabbepi catuttiṁsa honti.
atk-abh03a2:61_3: te dhamme sandhāya ekena khandhenātiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:62_0: Tatrāyaṁ nayo – rūpakkhandhena hi cattāro khandhā nibbānañca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:62_1: Āyatanadhātusaṅgahena pana ṭhapetvā viññāṇaṁ avasesā saṅgahitāti viññāṇameva tīhipi khandhasaṅgahādīhi asaṅgahitaṁ nāma.
atk-abh03a2:62_2: Puna tena viññāṇena saddhiṁ nibbānena cattāro khandhā khandhādisaṅgahena asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:62_3: Te sabbepi puna viññāṇeneva khandhādisaṅgahena asaṅgahitāti ekena khandhena, ekenāyatanena,
atk-abh03a2:62_5: Atha vā – yadetaṁ rūpakkhandhena viññāṇameva tīhi khandhādisaṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:62_6: tehipi viññāṇadhammehi te rūpadhammāva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:62_7: Puna te rūpadhammā viññāṇeneva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:62_8: Viññāṇañca khandhato eko viññāṇakkhandho hoti, āyatanato ekaṁ manāyatanaṁ, dhātuto satta viññāṇadhātuyo.
atk-abh03a2:62_10: Iminā upāyena sabbattha yaṁ pucchāya uddhaṭaṁ padaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:62_13: Tattha dutiyapañhe tāva – rūpaviññāṇānaṁ vasena veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:62_15: Te ca dve khandhā ekādasāyatanāni sattarasa dhātuyo honti.
atk-abh03a2:63_1: Tatiyapañhe – viññāṇaṁ rūpādīhi catūhi asaṅgahitanti tesaṁ vasena khandhādayo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:64_1: Catutthapañhe – cakkhāyatanaṁ vedanādīhi catūhīti iminā nayena sabbattha khandhādayo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:64_2: Pariyosāne – rūpañca dhammāyatananti uddānagāthāya dassitadhammāyeva aññenākārena saṅkhipitvā dassitāti.
atk-abh03a2:67_2: Tattha yaṁ labbhati yañca na labbhati taṁ sabbaṁ pucchāya gahitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:67_3: Vissajjane pana yaṁ na labbhati, taṁ natthīti paṭikkhittaṁ. Catūhi sampayogo, catūhi vippayogo;
atk-abh03a2:67_4: sabhāgo visabhāgoti hi vacanato catūhi arūpakkhandheheva sabhāgānaṁ ekasantānasmiṁ ekakkhaṇe uppannānaṁ arūpakkhandhānaṁyeva aññamaññaṁ sampayogo labbhati.
atk-abh03a2:67_6: nibbānassa ca rūpena saddhiṁ sampayogo nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a2:67_7: Tathā rūpanibbānānaṁ arūpakkhandhehi, visabhāgā hi te tesaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:67_9: evaṁ bhinnasantānehi nānākkhaṇikehi arūpadhammehipi saddhiṁ natthiyeva.
atk-abh03a2:67_11: Ayaṁ pana visabhāgatā saṅgahaṭṭhena virujjhanato saṅgahanaye natthi.
atk-abh03a2:67_14: Evamettha yassa ekadhammenapi sampayogalakkhaṇaṁ na yujjhati,
atk-abh03a2:67_15: tassa pucchāya saṅgahaṁ katvāpi natthīti paṭikkhepo kato.
atk-abh03a2:67_16: Yassa vippayogalakkhaṇaṁ yujjati, tassa vippayogo dassito.
atk-abh03a2:67_17: Yāni pana padāni sattasu viññāṇadhātūsu ekāyapi avippayutte rūpena nibbānena vā missakadhamme dīpenti,
atk-abh03a2:67_18: tāni sabbathāpi idha na yujjantīti na gahitāni. Tesaṁ idamuddānaṁ –
atk-abh03a2:71_0: Gocchakesu ca paññāsa, aṭṭha cūḷantare padā.
atk-abh03a2:73_0: Tevīsa padasataṁ etaṁ, sampayoge na labbhatī’’ti.
atk-abh03a2:74_0: Dhammāyatanañhi rūpanibbānamissakattā tasmiṁ apariyāpannena viññāṇenapi na sakkā sampayuttanti vattuṁ.
atk-abh03a2:74_2: tasmā vippayuttantipi na sakkā vattuṁ. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a2:74_3: Evaṁ sabbatthāpi etāni na yujjantīti idha na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:74_4: Sesāni khandhādīni yujjantīti tāni gahetvā ekekavasena ca samodhānena ca pañhavissajjanaṁ kataṁ. Tesu pañhesu,
atk-abh03a2:75_1: Dutiye – tīhīti pucchitaṁ pucchitaṁ ṭhapetvā sesehi.
atk-abh03a2:75_5: Evaṁ sabbattha rūpassa vippayoge dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu arūpaṁ,
atk-abh03a2:75_6: arūpassa vippayoge rūpaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Tatiyapañho uttānatthova.
atk-abh03a2:76_1: Catutthe – ‘katihi khandhehī’tiādiṁ avatvā sampayuttanti natthīti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:76_4: Ādipañhasmiñhi sarūpato dassetvā parato pāḷi saṁkhittā.
atk-abh03a2:77_0: 234.Soḷasahi dhātūhīti cakkhuviññāṇadhātu tāva attānaṁ ṭhapetvā chahi viññāṇadhātūhi, dasahi ca rūpadhātūhi. Sesāsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a2:78_5: Etesu hi taṁ saccadvayaṁ kehici sampayuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:80_1: Rūpabhavapañhe – sabbesampi arūpakkhandhānaṁ arūpāyatanānañca atthitāya na kehicīti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:80_2: Ghānajivhākāyaviññāṇadhātūnaṁ pana natthitāya tīhi dhātūhi vippayuttoti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:81_2: Pannarasahīti sesāhi dasahi rūpadhātūhi, pañcahi ca cakkhuviññāṇādīhi.
atk-abh03a2:82_1: Kusalapañhe – kusalehi catunnampi khandhānaṁ gahitattā sampayogo paṭikkhitto.
atk-abh03a2:84_3: Savitakkasavicārapañhe – pannarasahīti pañcahi viññāṇehi saddhiṁ rūpadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a2:84_6: Pītiṁ ṭhapetvā sesā pītisahagatā. Tattha vicāro vicārena,
atk-abh03a2:84_7: pīti ca pītiyā na sampayuttāti saṅkhārakkhandhadhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu kehici sampayuttā nāma.
atk-abh03a2:85_2: Kehicīti ye tattha parittārammaṇā na honti, tehi.
atk-abh03a2:85_3: Dhammadhātu pana parittārammaṇānaṁ channaṁ cittuppādānaṁ vasena catūhi khandhehi saṅgahitattā paṭhamapaṭikkhepameva bhajati.
atk-abh03a2:86_5: Sahetukā ceva na ca hetūpi pītisahagatasadisāva. Tathā parāmāsasampayuttā. Anupādinnā anuppannasadisāva.
atk-abh03a2:89_2: Tatridaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ – imasmiñhi vāre pucchāya uddhaṭapadena ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi ye dhammā vippayuttā,
atk-abh03a2:89_3: tesaṁ khandhādīhi vippayogaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:89_6: Tasmā tañca aññāni ca evarūpāni padāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:89_7: Yāni pana padāni dhammadhātuyā sampayutte dhamme viññāṇañca aññena asammissaṁ dīpenti, tāni idha gahitāni. Tesaṁ idamuddānaṁ –
atk-abh03a2:96_2: tāni uppaṭipāṭiyāpi samodhānetvā tattha vedanākkhandhādikā pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a2:96_4: Vedanākkhandhādipañhe tāva – ekenāti manāyatanena. Sattahīti viññāṇadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a2:96_6: Viññāṇadhātupañhe – te dhammā na kehicīti te pucchāya uddhaṭapadaṁ viññāṇadhātuṁ ṭhapetvā sesā cha viññāṇadhātudhammā, rūpaṁ, nibbānañca.
atk-abh03a2:96_7: Tehi sabbesaṁ khandhāyatanānaṁ saṅgahitattā na kehici khandhehi āyatanehi vā vippayuttā.
atk-abh03a2:96_8: Ekāya dhātuyāti yā yā pucchāya uddhaṭā hoti tāya tāya.
atk-abh03a2:97_2: Iminā nayena sabbattha pucchāya uddhaṭapadeneva saddhiṁ vippayuttānaṁ vasena attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a2:100_3: Rūpakkhandhena hi vippayuttā nāma cattāro khandhā,
atk-abh03a2:100_6: tassa ca kenaci sampayogo natthi. Evaṁ sabbapadesu.
atk-abh03a2:100_8: Iti pucchāya moghattā sabbavissajjanesu natthi natthiicceva vuttanti.
atk-abh03a2:103_3: puna tasseva khandhādīhi sampayogaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:103_4: Taṁ rūpena vā rūpamissakehi vā sabbarūpakkhandhasaṅgāhakehi vā padehi saddhiṁ na yujjati.
atk-abh03a2:103_5: Rūpena hi rūpamissakena vā aññesaṁ sampayogo natthi.
atk-abh03a2:103_6: Sabbarūpakkhandhasaṅgāhakehi sabbesaṁ sampayogārahānaṁ khandhādīnaṁ gahitattā aññaṁyeva natthi,
atk-abh03a2:103_8: Tasmā tathārūpāni padāni idha na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:103_9: Yāni pana padāni rūpena asammissaṁ arūpekadesaṁ dīpenti, tāni idha gahitāni. Tesaṁ idamuddānaṁ –
atk-abh03a2:110_0: Sabbapañhesu pana ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭā, te yehi sampayuttā honti,
atk-abh03a2:110_2: Vedanākkhandhena hi itare tayo khandhā sampayuttā,
atk-abh03a2:110_4: So tehi saññādīhi tīhi khandhehi, ekena manāyatanena, sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi, ekasmiṁ dhammāyatane, dhammadhātuyā ca,
atk-abh03a2:110_5: kehici saññāsaṅkhāreheva sampayutto. Eseva nayo sabbatthāti.
atk-abh03a2:113_2: Tattha ye sampayogavippayogapadaniddese rūpakkhandhādayo dhammā uddhaṭā, sabbapucchāsu teyeva uddhaṭā.
atk-abh03a2:113_3: Sadisavissajjanānaṁ pana ekato gahitattā padāni aññāya paṭipāṭiyā āgatāni.
atk-abh03a2:113_12: kehici vedanādīhi dhammeheva vippayutto. Eseva nayo sabbatthāti.
atk-abh03a2:116_2: Tattha ye saṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadaniddese samudayasaccādayova dhammā uddhaṭā, sabbapucchāsu teyeva uddhaṭā.
atk-abh03a2:116_3: Sadisavissajjanānaṁ pana ekato gahitattā padāni aññāya paṭipāṭiyā āgatāni.
atk-abh03a2:116_4: Tattha ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭapadena khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
atk-abh03a2:116_5: tesaṁ yehi sampayogo vā vippayogo vā hoti,
atk-abh03a2:117_0: Tatrāyaṁ nayo – samudayasaccena tāva saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā dhammā khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitā. Te ca sesehi tīhi khandhehi, ekena manāyatanena, sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi,
atk-abh03a2:117_1: saṅkhārakkhandhe dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca ṭhapetvā taṇhaṁ sesehi sampayuttattā kehici sampayuttā nāma. Ekena pana rūpakkhandhena, dasahi rūpāyatanehi, rūpadhātūhi ca vippayuttā,
atk-abh03a2:120_2: Tattha ye sampayuttenasampayuttapadaniddese vedanākkhandhādayo dhammā uddhaṭā, sabbapucchāsu teyeva uddhaṭā.
atk-abh03a2:120_3: Tattha ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭapadena sampayuttā,
atk-abh03a2:120_4: tesaṁ yehi saṅgaho vā asaṅgaho vā hoti,
atk-abh03a2:121_0: Tatrāyaṁ nayo – vedanākkhandho hi saññādīhi sampayutto.
atk-abh03a2:121_3: sattahi ca viññāṇadhātūhīti aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā,
atk-abh03a2:124_2: Tattha ye pañcame asaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadaniddese rūpakkhandhena sadisapañhā dhammā, ye ca arūpabhavena sadisā, teyeva uddhaṭā.
atk-abh03a2:124_3: Sesā pana na ruhantīti na uddhaṭā.
atk-abh03a2:124_4: Vedanākkhandhena hi khandhādivasena pana rūpārūpadhammā asaṅgahitā honti.
atk-abh03a2:124_5: Tesañca sampayogo nāma natthi. Tasmā yāni padāni ruhanti,
atk-abh03a2:124_7: Tattha ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭadhammehi khandhādivasena asaṅgahitā,
atk-abh03a2:124_8: te yehi sampayuttā ca vippayuttā ca,
atk-abh03a2:125_0: Tatrāyaṁ nayo – rūpakkhandhena tāva viññāṇameva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:125_2: dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca vedanādīheva sampayuttaṁ. Ekena rūpakkhandhena,
atk-abh03a2:125_5: Taṁ sandhāya te dhammā tīhi khandhehītiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:128_2: Tattha yesaṁ padānaṁ vippayogo na ruhati,
atk-abh03a2:128_3: tāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni. Kāni pana tānīti? Dhammāyatanādīni.
atk-abh03a2:128_4: Dhammāyatanassa hi khandhādīsu ekenāpi vippayogo na ruhati.
atk-abh03a2:134_0: Cha padāni tato uddhaṁ sabbānipi samāsato;
atk-abh03a2:135_0: Padāni ca na labbhanti, cattālīsañca satta cā’’ti.
atk-abh03a2:136_0: Pariyosāne ca – dhammāyatanaṁ dhammadhātūti gāthāpi imamevatthaṁ dīpetuṁ vuttā.
atk-abh03a2:136_1: Imāni pana ṭhapetvā sesāni sabbānipi labbhanti.
atk-abh03a2:143_0: Ñātuṁ sabbepi nayā, saṅkhepakathāva iti vuttā.
atk-abh03a2:145_0: Vacanañca ativiya bahuṁ, bhaveyya attho ca aviseso.
atk-abh03a2:146_0: Iti ūnabhāṇavāradvayāya, yaṁ tantiyā mayā etaṁ;
atk-abh03a2:147_0: Kurunā pattaṁ puññaṁ, sukhāya taṁ hotu lokassāti.
